CustomField.description: Indicates whether the partner has been marked as Do Not Contact. This is typically used for internal purposes, such as service recovery, to ensure no outreach is made.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Tick this checkbox to mark the partner as Do Not Contact (DNC).
When checked: The partner is flagged as DNC, and no outreach should be made by the team. Contact the Account Owner with any questions. When unchecked: The partner is not flagged and can be contacted as normal.
CustomField.label: Do Not Contact (DNC)
